ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors wish to thank Dr. Tilusha Manchanayaka from Veterinary Institute, Gannoruwa, Sri Lanka, for histopathological investigations, Mr. W. G. S. S. Kumara, Senior Medical Laboratory Technician, from the Animal Centre, Medical Research Institute, Sri Lanka, and Gowdhami Balakrishnan from Bharathidasan University, India, for the technical support. The authors also wish to thank the National Research Council of Sri Lanka for financial support with grant no. 12-054 and India Science and Research Fellowship (ISRF) Program of DST, India, which provided a travel grant to Thikshani Somarathna (TS) to carry out the cytotoxicity study in India.
